item.title: Gradle and gradle init
item.description: What is gradle? Gradle is an open source build automation system that builds upon the concepts of Apache Ant and Apache Maven and introduces a Groovy-based domain-specific language (DSL) instead of the XML form used by Apache Maven of declaring the project configuration. (wikipedia) Here are more build tools from a stackoverflow post linked later: Apache Ant & Apache Maven - Java sbt (Simple Build Tool) - for Scala A-A-P - Python based build tool Rake (Apache Builder) - Ruby Leiningen for Clojure There is gulpjs and gruntjs for Javascript too.
